item.title: Pushing like a dream with git alias
item.description: For years I have staged, committed and pushed changes with the RStudio Git interface. It works! But it can be time-consuming when you are doing it a lot. And I’ve been trying to use my mouse less. It would be better to do this in the terminal. I found this solution on stackoverflow, which suggests staging and committing all files by running the following in the terminal: git add -A && git commit -m "rebuild site" We can push like this:
